video_prompt: Subtle head tilt and gaze shift. Her left hand slowly raises, while her right arm gracefully bends at the elbow, both hands gently resting on her lap. The transparent corset reveals softly pulsing orange mechanical parts. A light source subtly illuminates the robotic-human hybrid's face from the left, its intensity fluctuating.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** High-angle full shot of elegant female robotic-human hybrid, seated on ornate gold chair. Dark grey theatrical backdrop. Subtle lighting from left illuminates her face. Head tilted right, gazing forward. Long dark brown hair, silver pendant earrings, silver choker. Cropped white top with black stripes (school uniform style), black collar, pink bow. Transparent corset revealing glowing orange robotic internals (musculature). Transparent skirt showing robotic thigh. White stocking on lower left leg. Intricate gold chair detailing. Luminous gold signature "C29" bottom right. Dramatic lighting, detailed human and robotic elements.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle head tilt and gaze shift. Her left hand slowly raises, while her right arm gracefully bends at the elbow. Orange mechanical parts within the transparent corset softly pulse. Light across the robotic-human hybrid's face subtly fluctuates in intensity from the left.
